data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 255 believers in Vaitupu.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vaitupu, Tuvalu
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Vaitupu, Tuvalu.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Vaitupu. Through your servants plant 2 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Vaitupu, Tuvalu need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Motufoua School
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Motufoua School, Vaitupu, Tuvalu.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Vaitupu, Tuvalu that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Vaitupu against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Vaitupu with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
